q: how do i scan a medicine
a: From Home, tap 'Scan a Medicine' and point your camera at the barcode.

q: how do i scan a food
a: Tap 'Scan a Food' then scan the barcode. You can also upload a barcode image.

q: how do i scan a cosmetic
a: Tap 'Scan a Cosmetic' and scan the barcode to check details and dates.

q: how do i scan a leaf
a: Choose 'Scan a Leaf' and capture a clear photo of the leaf for analysis.
